&#91;[<span id="displayNameRegion"></span>]&#93;
</div>

<script>
$("#[[namedRegionBoundElement]]").blur(function() {
 displayWorkflowName('displayNameRegion','[[namedRegionBoundElement]]','[[Dev2ElementNameCollection]]','[[[[namedRegionBoundElement]]]]', false);
});

$("#[[namedRegionBoundElement]]").keyup(function(evt) {
 var names = "[[Dev2WebPageElementNames]]";
 displayWorkflowName('displayNameRegion','[[namedRegionBoundElement]]','[[Dev2ElementNameCollection]]','[[[[namedRegionBoundElement]]]]', true);
 var charCode = (evt.which) ? evt.which : event.keyCode;
 if(charCode == 36 || charCode == 35 || charCode == 37 || charCode == 39 || charCode == 8 || charCode == 46 || charCode == 17){
 }else{
 this.value = $.trim(this.value).replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]+/g,'');
 }
});

$(document).ready(function(){
 displayWorkflowName('displayNameRegion','[[namedRegionBoundElement]]','[[Dev2ElementNameCollection]]','[[[[namedRegionBoundElement]]]]', true);
});
</script>" IndexNumber="1"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> </scg:List> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowDecision.False> </FlowDecision> </Flowchart.StartNode> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID1</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID2</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID3</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID4</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>
